content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.atlasobscura.com/ and search for interesting places to visit. The website provides a directory of unique destinations and stories about places and foods offered by Atlas Obscura. It also mentions upcoming trips, experiences, and courses. Readers can contribute to the Atlas by adding and editing places. The website has several links including Trips, Experiences, Courses, and Places. However, when I executed the command to get hyperlinks, it returned too much output and failed. Then, you gave me a command to google the best resources to learn different languages, which returned 8 different links to explore.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "question": "What are some of the most useful and interesting resources and courses for learning different languages?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of 10 highly rated and reviewed apps and online platforms for learning a new language, including Rosetta Stone, Duolingo, Babbel, Memrise, Busuu, FluentU, Mondly, Fluent City, Fluenz, and Rype. Each option has its own pros and cons, such as price, language options, and teaching methods. The resources offer comprehensive language and lessons, are free or affordable with varied payment plans, and present a wide variety of instruction styles to suit every type of student. \n \n Links: ['here (https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language#privacy)', 'Privacy Policy (https://www.insider-inc.com/privacy-policy)', 'Storage Preferences (https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language#39f47620-d830-42d4-891b-5a148d191fd4)', 'Main content (https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language#post-headline)', 'Search (https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language#search)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "interesting stories or history associated with the places mentioned on Atlas Obscura website"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.atlasobscura.com/", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/best-history-stories-2022", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/united-states", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/washington-dc", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/west-virginia", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/london-england", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/new-york", "https://www.atlasobscura.com/things-to-do/boston-massachusetts"]'}]
"""
